name: Whack-a-Vote: Hammering the Polls
description: Whack a Vote: Hammering the Polls is a Virtual Reality game that allows you to vote in 2016’s Presidential Election in new innovative ways through the use of various new voting utensils. Shamelessly spend taxpayer money to cast your vote now!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Funny short VR experience for the Vive and very topical. Plus it's free so you may aswell try it out if you own a HTC Vive.
